casebody.data:
In the Matter of P.A.K. (a minor child).
appealed by Mother. No. 274P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Janet K. Ledbetter, Hillsborough, for Tanika Johnson. Carolyn J. Yancey, for Vance County DSS. Carolina S. Burnette, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent on the 19th day of May 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
